title: Make My Life Easier
desc: At one point, I worked as the internet sales manager at a car dealership. I found a lot of our customers weren't interested in the best way to buy a car, which is save money and pay cash.
author: Jamil

title: Backed By Science
desc: Humans have a thing called a learning bias. No matter how wise a saying is, we are much more apt to accept it as true if we trust the source. Not only that, but we're fascinated by ultimate truths that spur us into action.
author: Monjurul

title: Experience Has Taught Me Well
desc: Experience is the best teacher. But sometimes, the tuition is just too high. Smart people learn from other's mistakes. They also learn from other's success.
author: Jamil
